title: 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, Electronic Light-up Dance Pad with Wireless Bluetooth 5 Speeds 9 Levels, Dancing Mat for Toddlers Music Game Dance Toy for Girls Boys 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Year Old
descriptions:
Introducing the 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids! Get ready to dance and groove with this electronic light-up dance pad that will bring hours of fun and entertainment to your little ones.

Connect wirelessly via Bluetooth 5 to play music from your smartphone or other devices. With 5 speeds and 9 levels of difficulty, kids can choose from modes like Free Dance, Memory, and Bluetooth to keep things exciting. The LED score display adds a touch of excitement to the game.

Safety is key with this dance mat, featuring a soft, cushioned surface, non-slip silicone base, and high-quality vinyl material that is non-toxic, odorless, and waterproof. This extra-large mat is perfect for kids aged 3-12, making it a great gift for Christmas, birthdays, or Children's Day.

Don't miss out on the chance to improve observational skills and enhance physical coordination with the KIZJORYA Dance Mat. Power it up with 4 AA batteries (not included) and let the dancing begin!
